meanings: civil[public] servant, public official, government employee[official]

vlive.korean: 공무원 되게, 그 나이 때 공무원을 생각했다고? Civil servant? - At that age you thought of that? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 채연이의 고민상담2♡
vlive.english: Civil servant? - At that age you thought of that?

vlive.korean: 공무원 시험 준비시라고요? You're preparing for a government official's exam? 듣기 View video ONE : 🐒

vlive.korean: 앞에 그 공무원 시험 2관왕한 분 사연 들으셨죠? Did you hear about the woman who passed two civil service exams? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]RADIO APART X CHOI DANIEL (RADIO APART X 최다니엘)
vlive.english: Did you hear about the woman who passed two civil service exams?

vlive.korean: 경찰 공무원시험을 준비 중인 경시생이 보내온 사연이에요. This story is from a person getting ready for his police academy exam. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]RADIO APART X BAEK JIN HEE (RADIO APART X 백진희)
vlive.english: This story is from a person getting ready for his police academy exam.

examples.korean: They remonstrated with the official about the decision. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 결정에 대해 그 공무원에게 항의했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
